post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Hi Chillhoan,



I located your resume on Workopolis. Allow me to briefly introduce myself and the company. CPNInternational Inc. develops software for the banking industry. Our wireless payment and transfer technology facilitates global payment processes over the telephone, in a completely secure manner, and from anywhere in the world. We are a well funded, Toronto based, technology start-up now preparing to move to the next phase of our company’s evolution – our first large-scale client implementation.  



We are currently seeking a Senior Software Developer with a minimum of 5 years experience using Java, J2EE technologies. The Technical Team employs Open Source solutions, and they support the eXtreme (XP) Programming discipline to provide quality and reliable solutions. Please comment on your interest/availability. Kindly attach a word version of your resume if you would like to learn more about this exciting opportunity.



I look forward to your reply.



Best Regards,



--Richard



Richard Clements

CPNInternational Inc.

401 The West Mall, Suite 415

Etobicoke, Ontario M9C 5J5

tel. 647.439.5341 ext 259

richard.clements@cpninternational.com
post.title: Senior Java Developer - Job Opportunity
